changeSet.author: Petro Verheles
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE app_user ( id bigserial, create_date timestamp NULL, created_by varchar(255) NULL, modified_by varchar(255) NULL, modify_date timestamp NULL, "version" int8 NULL, email varchar(255) NOT NULL, "name" varchar(255) NULL, "password" varchar(255) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT app_user_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT uk_app_user_email UNIQUE (email) );
